rules.name: Infostealer C2 IP Match
rules.description: Outbound connections to known info-stealer command-and-control infrastructure.
rules.recommended_action: Block the destination IP, isolate host, and check for credential theft.

rules.name: Infostealer C2 Domain Match
rules.description: Communication with domains used by RedLine, Lumma, Vidar, and Raccoon Stealer.
rules.recommended_action: Review DNS logs, block domain, and recover compromised credentials.

rules.name: Infostealer Hash Match
rules.description: Execution of malware samples linked to major infostealer campaigns.
rules.recommended_action: Quarantine sample, perform memory analysis, reset credentials.
